movies.title: Maadadayo
movies.plot: This film tells the story of professor Uehida Hyakken-sama (1889-1971), in Gotemba, around the forties. He was a university professor until an air raid, when he left to become a writer and has to live in a hut. His mood has hardly changed, not by the change nor by time. Every year his students celebrate his birthday, issuing the question "Mahda kai?" (not yet?), just to hear Uehida-san's answer "Madada yo!" (No, not yet!), in a ritual of self affirmation, and desires of lasting forever. It's a very "japanese" film who portrays everyday life and customs in Japan.
movies.simplePlot: Following World War II, a retired professor approaching his autumn years finds his quality of life drastically reduced in war-torn Tokyo. Denying despair, he pursues writing and celebrates his birthday with his adoring students.

biography.bio: Tatsuo Matsumura was born on December 18, 1914 in Kanagawa, Japan. He was an actor, known for Maadadayo (1993), Harakiri (1962) and Samurai Rebellion (1967). He died on June 18, 2005 in Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Tatsuo Matsumura

biography.bio: Hisashi Igawa was born on November 17, 1936 in Shenyang, Occupied Manchuria. He is an actor, known for Ran (1985), Rhapsodie en août (1991) and Maadadayo (1993).
biography.name: Hisashi Igawa

biography.bio: George Tokoro was born on January 26, 1955 in Saitama, Japan as Takayuki Haga. He is an actor, known for Ponyo (2008), Maadadayo (1993) and Kinkyû tokuban saiensu misuterî 7: Sore wa unmei ka kiseki ka!? (2009).
biography.name: George Tokoro

biography.bio: Masayuki Yui was born in 1947 in Kamakura, Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor and writer, known for Ran (1985), Kagemusha, l'ombre du guerrier (1980) and Maadadayo (1993).
biography.name: Masayuki Yui

biography.bio: Akira Terao is the son of the famous actor Jukichi Uno. After graduating from Bunka Gakuin University, he formed a rock band "The Savage" which experienced brief success thanks to their hit 'Itsumademo, Itsumademo'. In 1967, Kei Kuma hired him to play alongside his father in his film 'Tunnel of Kurobe'. Terao then signed a contract with Ishihara Productions for which he appeared in several films. Akira Kurosawa chose him to play in two of his films, 'Ran' (1985) and mainly, as Kurosawa himself, in 'Dreams' (1990). On the other hand Terao continues to write and sing songs and his song 'Ruby no Yubiwa' was awarded the 'Record Taisho' prize for 1986. He also regularly works for television, notably for Ishihara TV Productions.
biography.name: Akira Terao

biography.bio: Takeshi Kusaka was born in 1931 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Maadadayo (1993), Antarctica (1983) and Street Fighter II: The Animated Movie (1994). He has been married to Fujiko Kimura since 2010.
biography.name: Takeshi Kusaka

biography.bio: Asei Kobayashi was born on August 11, 1932. He is known for his work on House (1977), Kagaku ninja tai Gatchaman F (1979) and Angel (1979).
biography.name: Asei Kobayashi

biography.bio: Kyôko Kagawa was born on December 5, 1931 in Ibaraki, Japan as Kyoko Ikebe. She is an actress, known for High and Low (1963), Tokyo Story (1953) and Sansho the Bailiff (1954).
biography.name: Kyôko Kagawa

biography.bio: Mitsuru Hirata was born on November 2, 1953 in Aichi, Japan. He is an actor, known for La marche de Kamata (1982), Maadadayo (1993) and Shabu-Shabu Spirit (2015).
biography.name: Mitsuru Hirata

biography.bio: Takao Zushi was born on June 25, 1946 in Osaka, Japan. He is known for his work on Ran (1985), Maadadayo (1993) and Après la pluie (1999). He died on April 1, 2005 in Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Takao Zushi

biography.bio: Nobuto Okamoto was born on January 2, 1948 in Yamaguchi, Japan. He is an actor, known for Maadadayo (1993), Sosuke, le cocu (1992) and Akuma no temari-uta (1977).
biography.name: Nobuto Okamoto

biography.bio: Tetsu Watanabe was born in 1951 in Japan. He is known for his work on Fireworks (1997), Sonatine, mélodie mortelle (1993) and Le royaume des chats (2002).
biography.name: Tetsu Watanabe

biography.bio: Kimihiro Reizei was born on February 9, 1947 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Princess Mononoke (1997), Maadadayo (1993) and Shufu no taiken repôto: Zoku onna no yojôhan (1975).
biography.name: Kimihiro Reizei

biography.bio: Norio Matsui was born on April 15, 1951 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Ran (1985), Kagemusha, l'ombre du guerrier (1980) and Maadadayo (1993).
biography.name: Norio Matsui

biography.bio: Akihiko Sugizaki is an actor, known for Ran (1985), Kagemusha, l'ombre du guerrier (1980) and Maadadayo (1993).
biography.name: Akihiko Sugizaki

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Won Award of the Japanese Academy
Nominated Award of the Japanese Academy
